[...] and three hundred. (The following witnesses) have testified to it.
[..................] her nuptial gift .........
[.................. the wi]tnesses to this act, that she is the wife of Merqûre, son of
[..................] this day, mentioned as a date in this document, in Ṣafar
[of the year] three hundred and [s]ix. (The following witnesses) have testified to it.
[So and So ib]n ʿUmar b. Muhâǧir [is witness] to the acknowledgment by ......... daughter of Banṭalos,
[respecting all that (is contained) in] this document. Ḥamdân b. ʿUmar b. Muhâǧir is witness to the same,
[and he has written his testimony in] Ṣafar of the year three hundred and six.
